description:
Murano Yukime is http://anidb.net/ch16163 [Ryoushi]`s aunt. She is a novelist who writes romance stories, using her pen name "Yuki" and just happens to be http://anidb.net/ch16161 [Ryouko]`s favorite, and landlady of apartment "Okashisou" where Ryoushi lives. She is based on Japanese tale Yuki-onna.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Murano Yukime
